CustomField.inlineHelpText: The total amount of the medication contained in the packaged product. If the medication dosage is a ratio, specify the numerator value. If the medication dosage is a range, specify the lower dosage value. If the medication dosage is a simple dose, specify the quantity. Examples: If quantity is 10 units/ml, then enter 10 in this field and 1 in Quantity Denominator. If quantity is 1-2 pills/day, then enter 1 in this field and 2 in Quantity Denominator.
